key_risks: Labor and wage issues, including wage violations and pay discrimination
Environmental concerns, particularly historical pollution and ongoing scrutiny of water usage and chemical waste
Supply chain vulnerabilities and rising labor costs
Competitive pressures in the uniform rental market
controversies: Legal challenges related to wage violations and overtime pay
Pay discrimination settlement at New Kensington facility
environmental_issues: Ongoing scrutiny of water usage, chemical waste, and energy consumption in the uniform rental industry
governance_issues: Compliance risks related to labor laws and environmental regulations
